text: Midnight Vampire (午夜殭屍) is a 1936 Hong Kong film directed by Yeung Kung-Leung. It is the first movie to feature a Jiangshi (Chinese hopping vampire). ==Cast== *Yeung Yat-Ping *Woo Dip-Ying *Chao Fei-Fei *Chiu King-Wan *Chu Po- Chuen *Wong Sau-Nin *Hoh Ho-Man *Tsui Tai-Cheung *Tsak Sin-Chung *Cheng Lau- Kuen ==References== ==External links== *Midnight Vampire at IMDB *Midnight Vampire at HKMDB Category:Hong Kong films Category:1936 films Category:1936 horror films Category:Hong Kong action films Category:1930s monster movies Category:Jiangshi films Category:1930s action films Category:Hong Kong black- and-white films Category:1936 directorial debut films
title: Midnight Vampire
